body: I guess Amagi should be the main girl for the mc, but the author kinda failing to translate this to the audiece. Kano A.K.A The Childhood friend who in love with the mc and vice versa is happening to be the most boring and pointless girl in the harem. Does not translate well into the plot and really not serve anything usefull. And we have Anegasaki, who clutch the whole thing. Through the scenes she's got the most genuine relation with the MC and if he has to choose one, she should be the one. Even though Amagi(red hair) should be in that position, 'cus the author clearly try to push her into the main love interest, but through dialoge and scenes it failes.
So far it is an easy 10/10 hands down. Red hair girl is best girl.
I was so happy when he finally did it with sakura
DAMNIT, why are webtoons always censored?

So I've just finished up to Ch54. I dunno if they're still going to update this manga, but the story has not ended yet. There's definitely progress, though. Personally, I like the story. It's like an actual manhwa, with this amount of chapters/pages. There's NTR in the middle, but it got stopped by MC. It's, uh, funny how he "defeated" the NTR guy. But really, though, if I were the MC, I'm gonna try to get them all. I just can't choose between them; they're all quite lovable.
lol, that Episode 38 (p371). I thought MC was going to have a new member to his harem, iykwim. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
That shit's a fucking Harry Potter book
I'm a bit worried about sakuma

I don't mind the format, I guess I'm used to it. And it's alright with the sex scenes, the art is pretty sweet. What concerns me is this is a doujinshi from a trap artist that hasn't had any trap yet so far in the story... (ㆆ _ ㆆ) I don't want that kind of surprise!

i spent 1 hour and 30 minutes, trust me nothing happens at the end, it just keeps going, havinf sex with each girl everyday, no new thing like anal or breast fuck, just the same positions, only different places and stories, also nothing dramatic happens, all 3 just keep fucking errand guy.
